Text: It has come to my attention that there is some new additional content that my pdf did not include (extra fan art, etc).  If anyone believes that this should be added to the pdf and reposted as a different torrent; or if it should be posted in a different format, ie html document, .doc, .odt, etc please post so.  Additionally I could also post an archive with all the image files, and with the original flash .fla files.  If anyone wants these please post so below.  Thank you.
The thread can also be found at http://forums.somethingawful.com/showthread.php?threadid=2432725
